bibl.title: Dotawo's Later Dynasties: A Speculative History.
Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday.

bibl.note: Synthesizes the literary, documentary and epigraphic evidence for Nubian kings and their families in the 1100-1300s and suggests that despite the apparent conflict between various contenders for the throne dynastic succession was the standard operating principle in Dotawo throughout the late medieval period. - Avec résumé en anglais.
